name: HostelBookers.com
overview:
HostelBookers has over 20,000 properties in over 3,500 destinations worldwide that can be reserved by paying a 10% deposit. What’s more with those properties ranging from Hostels, Apartments, B+Bs, to Guest Houses and Hotels, HostelBookers have something for everyone. They even have a Castle in Scotland where you can stay, a Jumbo in Sweden, and a Cave Hotel in Turkey.

An easy to use booking path enables to select, search and sort properties by type, rating and price. With over 500,000 customer reviews on the site you’ll get great feedback on the property before you book.
